column4: I have a kodak cx7310 usb digital camera. what software do I need to get it to work on ubuntu?
Try changing the mode in your camera to PTP.
And you need to be in 'plugdev' or was that 'camera' group.
I added my user to group camera? what's PTP?
Don't ask me, it's just that libgphoto2 (gtkam) supports some cameras only in that mode.
Logout, login to make that groupadd in effective ..
